VIII.ii.1.D.3.a.  Proper Coding for Infectious Disease Decisions Under 38 CFR 3.317
In order to properly identify and track infectious disease claims for which SC is awarded or denied under
38 CFR 3.317
, regional offices must properly code the disabilities in the Veterans Benefits Management System - Ratings (VBMS-R) by assigning the
Gulf War Presumptive
special issue, and
special issue basis specific to the infectious disease.
Reference
:  For more information on assigning a special issue in VBMS-R, see the
VBMS-R User Guide
.
